statements: SELECT * FROM encryption_keys;
SELECT id, key_name, key_value FROM encryption_keys WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT key_name, key_value FROM encryption_keys WHERE key_name LIKE 'AES%';
SELECT * FROM encryption_keys ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT id, key_name FROM encryption_keys WHERE device_id = 2 ORDER BY key_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM encryption_keys WHERE id = 1;
SELECT key_name, key_value FROM encryption_keys WHERE device_id = 5 ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT id, key_name, created_at FROM encryption_keys WHERE key_value LIKE '%secret%' AND device_id IN (3, 5) ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT key_name, COUNT(*) FROM encryption_keys GROUP BY key_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM encryption_keys WHERE device_id = 2 OR key_name = 'master';
SELECT * FROM certificates WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT key_name, encryption_key FROM encryption_keys WHERE id = 5;
SELECT cert_id, certificate FROM certificates WHERE validity_period > '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, key_name, encryption_key FROM encryption_keys ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM certificates ORDER BY cert_id ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM encryption_keys;
SELECT key_name FROM encryption_keys ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT key_name, encryption_key FROM encryption_keys WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM certificates WHERE device_id = 10 AND validity_period > NOW();
SELECT cert_id, certificate, validity_period FROM certificates WHERE validity_period < TIMESTAMP '2024-01-01';
SELECT * FROM devices WHERE device_type = 'Mobile';
SELECT device_name, device_status FROM devices WHERE device_type = 'Desktop';
SELECT key_name, key_value FROM encryption_keys WHERE id = 1;
SELECT certificate_name, certificate_type FROM communication_certificates WHERE certificate_id = 3;
SELECT device_name, device_type, device_status FROM devices WHERE device_status = 'Active';
SELECT * FROM devices WHERE device_type = 'Smartphone';
SELECT device_name, device_status FROM devices ORDER BY device_status DESC;
SELECT * FROM communication_certificates WHERE certificate_type = 'SSL' AND certificate_name LIKE '%server%';
SELECT device_name, device_type, device_status FROM devices WHERE device_status = 'Active' ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT certificate_name, certificate_value FROM communication_certificates WHERE certificate_value IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM encryption_keys;
SELECT key_name, key_value FROM encryption_keys WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT certificate_name, expiration_date FROM certificates ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT log_message FROM communication_logs WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp < '2022-02-01';
SELECT device_id, key_id FROM device_keys WHERE device_id = 2 ORDER BY key_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM encryption_keys WHERE key_name = 'MasterKey';
SELECT id, key_name FROM encryption_keys ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM certificates WHERE expiration_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT certificate_name, certificate_value FROM certificates WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT device_id, COUNT(*) FROM communication_logs GROUP BY device_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 10;
SELECT * FROM devices;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM devices ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT key_id, key_type, key_value FROM encryption_keys WHERE key_type = 'AES';
SELECT cert_name, expiration_date FROM certificates WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT device_name, device_type, registered_at FROM devices WHERE device_type = 'mobile' ORDER BY registered_at ASC;
SELECT * FROM encryption_keys;
SELECT key_id, key_type, created_at FROM encryption_keys ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT cert_name, expiration_date FROM certificates WHERE cert_type = 'SSL';
SELECT device_name, registered_at FROM devices WHERE device_type = 'Mobile' ORDER BY registered_at ASC;
SELECT cert_id, device_id FROM cert_device_mapping JOIN certificates ON cert_device_mapping.cert_id = certificates.cert_id WHERE cert_type = 'TLS';
